input2: s/p lap band in and lap roux en y gastric bypass in by Dr. returns with four days of epigastric pain and two days of dark tarry stools though patient does report taking pepto-bismol. She denies diarrhea, BRBPR, but notes increased pain with eating resulting in poor PO intake over the past several days. Despite this, her urine output has been adequate and is not concentrated. She has been taking a PPI daily.
input4: FH: family history significant for ulcer disease in mother and sister
